sub_concepts.name: Calabi-Yau manifolds
sub_concepts.definition: Complex manifolds studied in superstring theory for compactification

sub_concepts.name: Extra dimensions
sub_concepts.definition: The additional dimensions beyond the usual three that are posited in superstring theory

sub_concepts.name: String compactification
sub_concepts.definition: The process of reducing the dimensions of strings from ten to four in order to describe our observable universe

sub_concepts.name: D-branes
sub_concepts.definition: Extended objects in string theory that can exist in various dimensions and play a key role in superstring theory
